summary:
Accomplished senior software engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering top-notch app development and troubleshooting. Always eager to explore the ever increasing world of software beyond mobile development.

Professional Summary

•	Software development experience in Java and Kotlin with expertise in design, development, testing and maintenance
•	Knowledge of SCRUM and Agile practices
•	Work with Client Product Owner to deliver new versions of the product 
•	Develop, demonstrate features to fellow team members, product owners, team leads and other team members at large 
•	Experience working with third party open source libraries and integrating them with existing applications

awards.title: Pride of the Quarter
awards.description:
Awarded for the following points :

- Help in setting up a team for mobile development at our Pune office. Making them technical strong.
- Building an Google Cardboard app to view the premises of the Pune office.

projects.title: American Eagle Group
projects.description:
App Description:
•   This project was built for the property agents working with American Eagle Title Company
•   It helped the property agents to do quick calculations related to property like what will be  the closing   costs if the prospect is selling his property

Role as a developer
•   Co-ordinated with client to get the proper requirements
•   It was completely re- written using fragments to make it future proof (compatible with future   versions of Android)
•   Support for both phones and tablets through use of fragments.
•   Architecting solutions for support on multiple devices, and various API levels starting at SDK Version 8(Android 2.2)
•   Implemented Google Maps version 2 for plotting the property on map
•   Implemented Multiple image picker library
•   Currently the project is in maintenance state

projects.title: Fullerton India
projects.description:
Attract potential clients to apply for the loan and upload the images of documents taken by device camera. This app helped the banks to ease the process of applying loan by reducing the approval period.

Role as developer
•   Worked end to end on the application
•   Developed API call mechanism for interaction with different services
•   Co-ordinated with client to get the proper requirements
•   Build for a specific set of tablets

projects.title: Massage Envy
projects.description:
App Description:
•	An app to schedule massage appointments across multiple US locations 
•	Additional functionalities include View past/upcoming appointments, User profile management, Therapists availability etc.
•	This app initially started out as native but is lately transformed to use Ionic and is only available in US Google Playstore

Role as a developer:
•	Worked on architecting the app with shared decisions with junior developers
•	Took a back seat and let junior developers take the lead
•	Followed the MVVM pattern and JetPack
•	Implemented dependency injection mechanism using Koin 
•	Major research & implementation of Google Tag Manager

projects.title: LillyPlus
projects.description:
App Description:
•	LillyPlus app makes it easy for patients to track their daily routines and log difficulties performing those depending on the condition enrolled 
•	Nice and intuitive UI
•	Data is kept synced across different platforms like Android, iOS, and Web

Role as developer:
•	Worked on architecting the app from ground up
•	Followed Google’s suggested architecture pattern MVVM and JetPack
•	Implemented dependency injection mechanism using Dagger
•	Developed API call mechanism for interaction with different services using Retrofit

projects.title: Gymnatics Checklist
projects.description:
App Description: 
•	It's a checklist kind of app wherein the club representatives visit the venue in order to check the condition and take appropriate measures to curb any incident.
•	The data entered is saved locally and allowed for edits as well. After all the data is filled in, the user can submit the data to server.
•	After submitting the data, a report is generated and send across to the concerned authorities for further processing.
•	  Data is synced in case of failure whenever the internet is available.

Role as a developer: 
•	  Developed android and iOS versions
•	  Analyzing and understanding client requirements

projects.title: KiddieMe
projects.description:
App Description: 
•	This app helps users to find out nearby places which are kid friendly
•	It defines different categories ranging from Baby Care to Health Care and everything in between
•	Users can also tag a place with relevant categories so that other users can be benefitted. 
•	Rating and reporting a place if longer available is also an option given in app

Role as developer:
•	Developed android and iOS versions
•	Analyzing and understanding client requirements 
•	Link to application on App Store and Google PlayStore

projects.title: ShopStyle by POPSUGAR
projects.description:
App Description: 
•	ShopStyle makes online shopping quick, easy, and fun, giving you
access to millions of products and brands from top retailers on your
phone or tablet
•	Browse the latest fashions by brand or category including women, men,
bags, shoes, furniture and kids clothing
•	See the latest in fashion and home decor from international retailers
from countries like US, UK, FRANCE, GERMANY, AUSTRALIA, CANADA,
JAPAN

Role as a developer: 
•	 Co-ordinated with the client to get the proper requirements
•	 Worked end to end on the application
•	 Extensive use of Google's networking library Volley for making API calls
•	 Support for both phones and tablets through the use of fragments

projects.title: ISKON Live Android App
projects.description:
App Description: 
•   With ISKCON LIVE you can watch: 
     -  ISKCON Juhu Temple LIVE
     -  ISKCON Vrindavan Temple LIVE
     -  250+ Video Discourses on the Bhagavad Gita
•   It has a subscription based model wherein the user needs to subscribe in order to view the videos

Role as developer:
•   Worked end to end on the application
•   Developed API call mechanism for interaction with different services
•   Implemented in-app purchase in the form of subscriptions
•   Implemented the temple design provided by the client

projects.title: IChangeMyCity
projects.description:
App Description: 
•	This application was built for an NGO in Bangalore
•	It helps users by reporting crimes and/or other problems related to day to day life (transportation, environmental etc.)
•	User can click a photo and upload the same with comments to server. The same is reflected on the website
•	NGO then asks government representatives of that area to fix the issues

Role as developer:
•	Worked end to end on the application
•	Developed API call mechanism for interaction with different services
•	Used XMLRPC protocol for logging-in user

projects.title: TrackMe
projects.description:
Project Description

This application is used to send the real time co-ordinates of your location to the server. You just have to activate the tracker and rest will be taken care by the application itself. It sends your location to server every minute.

profile_positions.description:
•	Part of the Application Development Support team to help customers adopt Backbase products in their respective stacks
•	Contribute back to Mobile SDK in terms of bug fixes etc.
•	Involved in some of the design decisions for making the product better
•      Active contributor in improving the internal processes of the department 
•	Leading Mobile development learning plan within the team
profile_positions.title: Principal Mobile Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Develop Android apps
•	Understanding requirements and fulfilling them with appropriate implementations
•	Mentoring and coaching junior team members
•	Constant knowledge transfer sessions across technologies
•	Leveraging advanced cognitive technologies, including NLP, using DialogFlow to implement a chatbot
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
•	 Developing Android and iOS apps
•	 Dealing with client, feeds and designs
•	 Understanding requirements and fulfilling them 
•	 Working across teams and one point of contact for technical implementation related stuff.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
* Development of mobile Android based apps.
* Deal with client's data, feeds, and designs.
* Co-operation with other development team members (e.g. PM, Designers, QA)
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer - Android
